name: snootiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unfriendly behaviour towards other people because you think that you are better than them: She has annoyed the press with her snootiness. The employees there all have an air of snootiness.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was not above eccentricity himself, or indeed the snootiness that can come with moving in elevated circles.She does not disguise her contempt for anything that smacks of snootiness or elitism.Despite being one of the city's finest hotels, there is no snootiness about the place.
